name: CareConnect-ConditionAssociatedLinks-1-Extension
description: This Extension resource is constrained to support condition associated links
requirements: The ability to add extensions in a structured way is what keeps FHIR resources simple.

element.name: extension
element.definition: A reference to another resource (e.g. MedicationOrder, Observation, ReferralRequest etc.) associated/linked to this condition.
A reference to another resource (e.g. MedicationOrder, Observation, ReferralRequest etc.) associated/linked to this condition.
